quoteDescs:
They were once a proud people.
They were brave and free.
descDescs: As the system host to the Federation’s homeworld, America is considered to be the center of the known world by many explorers, despite its status as a subjugate region to the Confederacy.

quoteDescs:
Half of the system is city,
but there's not a human in sight.
descDescs: Every planet of this system is packed with industrial equipment, driven by interstellar AI under the command of the Emperor-King and corporations on the Conglomerate Council.

quoteDescs:
"If you see an Imperial, duck."
- Public Service Announcement
descDescs: For centuries, Qian Xuesen was considered the jewel of the Conglomerate, boasting beautiful cities and extensive industry. Now, the system is under threat on two fronts.
The system is described by many as a "perpetual conflict zone" for good reason. Xiofang is a lawless wasteland, cursed by its strategic location in the Outer Systems.

quoteDescs:
Like the beast, Fenrir is unbound.
Unlike the beast, Fenrir yet wanders.
descDescs: The Empire has recently begun to expand their industrial capacities by capturing old Conglomerate Corporate facilities in this small, tumultuous solar system.

quoteDescs:
If you get close enough to it…
You just might hear their voices.
descDescs: Named after the unfortunate explorer Evan James Riley, who's starship can still be found orbiting the star, this system is well-documented and uneventful... according to the locals.
As the economic hub of the League, Bink can hardly be recognized as a colonial system settled by just a couple of very lucky privateers escaping the Conglomerate centuries ago.
